Hi Heath,

Sorry another thing we need to update is the blurb when someone selects 'Pay with EFT'.


  1. Can we please change the words 'PAYMENT UP FRONT' TO 'SELECT PAYMENT METHOD'

  2. Can we please have it changed to read


If paying by bank deposit / EFT, funds must be received as per the payment terms above and a copy of the bank receipt emailed to Novari to confirm payment.


  1. Please update email for Sydney to sydney@novaricollective.com and Melbourne melbourne@novaricollective.com

  2. Please remove the word 'Melbourne' after the bank name for both Syd and Melb

  3. The BSB and account number is not changing when you switch between Syd and Melb





Thanks!
